title: Where are SPT's branch locations across Ghana?
content: Standard Pension Trust operates 8 branches strategically located across Ghana to serve members nationwide. Our branches are located in: 1) Greater Accra (Main Office) - 42 Nii Nortei Nyanchi Street, Dzorwulu, 2) Takoradi - Amonoo Niezer Fie, Top Ten, Second Floor, 3) Kumasi - Stadium Amakom, City Style Building (same floor with Ash FM), 4) Ho - SSNIT Premises, 1st Floor, 5) Dunkwaw-on-Offin - Aban Keseɛ, SSNIT Building, 1st Floor, 6) Cape Coast - SSNIT House, Third Floor, 7) Techiman, and 8) Additional regional locations. Each branch provides comprehensive pension services and local support.

title: What services are available at SPT branch locations?
content: All SPT branches provide comprehensive pension services including account opening, contribution processing, benefit claims, pension planning consultations, document verification, and customer support. Each branch is staffed with trained professionals to assist with your pension needs.

title: How does SPT's branch network ensure accessibility?
content: With 8 strategically positioned branches across Ghana, SPT ensures that pension services are accessible to members in different regions. This network reduces travel time and provides local support, making pension management convenient for all members regardless of location.

title: What is the main office location and its role?
content: The main office at 42 Nii Nortei Nyanchi Street, Dzorwulu, Greater Accra serves as SPT's headquarters and primary customer service center. This location handles complex inquiries, administrative functions, and serves as the central hub for coordinating services across all branches.

title: How can I find the nearest SPT branch to my location?
content: Contact SPT at +233 30 278 0765 or email info@standardpensionstrust.com to find the nearest branch to your location. Our customer service team can provide directions, operating hours, and specific services available at each of our 8 branch locations across Ghana.

title: What are the complete details of SPT's 8 branch locations?
content: SPT operates 8 branches across Ghana: 1) GREATER ACCRA (Main Office): 42 Nii Nortei Nyanchi Street, Dzorwulu, Phone: +233 30 278 0765, 2) TAKORADI: Amonoo Niezer Fie, Top Ten, Second Floor, Phone: +233 24 702 3411 / +233 54 248 6962, 3) KUMASI: Stadium Amakom, City Style Building (same floor with Ash FM), Phone: +233 24 481 6344, 4) HO: SSNIT Premises, 1st Floor, Phone: +233 54 070 6701, 5) DUNKWAW-ON-OFFIN: Aban Keseɛ, SSNIT Building, 1st Floor, Phone: +233 54 129 1727 / +233 26 686 2185, 6) CAPE COAST: SSNIT House, Third Floor, Phone: +233 50 391 996 / +233 55 305 4830, 7) TECHIMAN: Phone: +233 20 203 5875, 8) Additional regional locations for comprehensive coverage. All branches provide full pension services including account management, contributions, claims, and consultations.

title: Does SPT have physical branches or only online services?
content: SPT operates both physical branches AND online services. We have 8 physical branch locations across Ghana providing in-person support, while also offering 24/7 digital access through our Member Portal, phone support, email, and WhatsApp. This dual approach ensures members can choose between visiting a local branch for face-to-face assistance or using our convenient digital platforms for quick access to services. Our branches are staffed with trained professionals for complex inquiries, document verification, and personalized pension planning consultations.

title: What is SPT's main office and headquarters location?
content: SPT's main office and headquarters is located at 42 Nii Nortei Nyanchi Street, Dzorwulu, Greater Accra, Ghana. This is our primary location that serves as the central hub for all operations. The main office handles complex administrative functions, serves as the primary customer service center, and coordinates services across all 8 branches. You can contact the main office at +233 30 278 0765 or email info@standardpensionstrust.com. Operating hours are Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. This location provides comprehensive pension services including account management, contributions, claims processing, consultations, and document verification.
